contact.name: Teia Ild
contact.description: A scared young revolutionary (from the outside world) searching for his sister

danger.name: Tagis
danger.description: An overseer who infiltrated the common people of Fabrication more than a decade ago

feature.name: Bathing Chamber
feature.description: Dusty and cracked, but functional. Water flows from an inverted well in the ceiling.

contact.name: Lamar
contact.description: An explorer of the primordial factory who has learned many of its secret places.

danger.name: Maron
danger.description: A prisoner so powerful and so foul that he was sealed away along with the beasts in the pen's dark recesses

feature.name: Amplification Chamber
feature.description: Beehive-like structure with a central pillar studded with protruding pipes, vents, and a tangled mass of black veins.

feature.name: Clean Room
feature.description: Pristine and stocked with precisely machined medical tools. A single operating table dominates the room.
